p: The Δ 9-desaturase activity was estimated using two fatty acids [palmitic acid (D9C16) and stearic acid (D9C18)] as follows: D9C16 = [C16:1/ (C16:0 + C16:1)] × 100 and D9C18 = [(C18:1 cis–9) / (C18:0 + C18:1 cis–9)] × 100, respectively. The elongase activity was estimated according to Smet et a. [ 34] with the following equation: elongase = [(C18:0+ C18:1 cis–9)/(C16:0 + C16:1 + C18:0 + C18:1 cis–9)] × 100.
